* Biomass smiled to himself when he saw Perndabot nearly jump when Nue'e 
touched his leg, thinking that now it was his turn to see how spooky this 
man was.
Nue'e looked up at Perndabot and pointed towards the IF.*

" What sort of science center does that contain?"

...................

* Tremmer lifted an eyebrow.*

" Ah."

* He sniffed for a second and turned his head away, then back towards 
Grimmer.*

" My ship crashed 'an all my crew's dead. Internal systems 're screwed 'nd I 
could use a repair."
